column4: Sorry, Can anyone post a link where I can grab the Alternate CD for Edgy? I can only find the main image....
you have to click the "All download location" thing on the bottom, then you get the old download thing (then "additional install options")
The other install option links, Thank you!
yeah, it's a really bad UI now.  There's a few bugreports about it ;)
no it doesn't, want me to restart and write down exact error?
exact errors are always better.  Yeah, if you don't mind.

The error I am getting is, "GDM could not write to your authorization file. This could be because you are out of Disk Space, or your home directory is not open for writing. In any case you cannot be logged in. Please contact your system admin."
alright, so the next question is obviously, are you out of space?  Or are your permissions messed up?
I have no idea how to check my current permissions since I am running LiveCD
You can boot up into single user mode (at grub, recovery console), that'll just be a terminal.  And you can check your permissions for your home folder and stuff.
oh, ok.  You'll just need to mount your harddrive
Can you give me a hint as to how to mount my HD?
Is there a chance I can login as /root and change the permissions from there?

https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Mount#head-0fdee867fdf2bacbf96cfbb0c41eda446d2ca8ee  but, I've gotta run. There are plenty of other people that can help.  You can chagne permissions from the liveCD, actually.
